column5: This bright and cozy Austin condo is walking distance to downtown, 2 blocks from the University, and 5 blocks from the Capitol! It's the perfect location for SXSW and our other music festivals, football games and people just wanting to check out Austin! You will feel right at home, with modern kitchen and bath, and private off-street parking. Included on the property is a pool, laundry, and it's surrounded by great food options.
